TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormattedText extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中的绘图文本提供低级别的控制。

span.span: Provides low-level control for drawing text in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象允许您绘制多行文本，在这种情况下，文本中的每个字符都可以单独设置格式。The object allows you to draw multi-line text, in which each character in the text can be individually formatted. 下例演示应用了多种格式的文本。The following example shows text that has several formats applied to it. ![使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本")![Text displayed using FormattedText object](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "Text displayed using FormattedText object") 格式化文本字符串的示例Example of a formatted text string 就中的文本功能而言 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ， 被视为 "低级别"，因为它将文本作为图形元素处理。In terms of text features in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], is considered "low-level" because it processes text as graphical elements. 文本的其他方面 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] （ (专用于文本的控件的上下文中的文本 ）、 ) 、实现流文档模型 (请参阅[流文档概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview)) 或支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档模型 (参见[WPF) 中的文档](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf)。Other aspects of text in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] handle text in the context of controls that are dedicated to text (, ), implement the flow document model (see [Flow Document Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview)), or support the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document model (see [Documents in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf)). 中的很多 setter 方法 与支持的附加属性具有相似之处 ，但 附加属性适用于 flow 或的更高级别文本支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 。Many of the setter methods in have similarities to attached properties that are supported by , but the attached properties apply to the higher-level text support either for flow or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象，然后将多个格式设置样式应用于该文本。The following example creates a object and then applies several formatting styles to the text. [!code-csharp[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#formattedtextsnippets1)] [!code-vb[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#formattedtextsnippets1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本转换为对象时 ，它不再是字符的集合，您无法修改文本字符串中的字符。When text is converted to a object, it is no longer a collection of characters - you cannot modify the characters in the text string. 但是，可修改已转换文本的笔划和填充属性，以此来影响该文本的外观。However, you can affect the appearance of the converted text by modifying its stroke and fill properties. 下面的示例演示了通过修改已转换文本的笔划和填充来创建视觉效果的多种方法。The following examples illustrate several ways of creating visual effects by modifying the stroke and fill of converted text. ![对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本")![Text with different colors for fill and stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "Text with different colors for fill and stroke") 将笔划和填充设置为不同颜色的示例Example of setting stroke and fill to different colors ![笔划应用了图像画笔的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "笔画应用了图像画笔的文本")![Text with image brush applied to stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "Text with image brush applied to stroke") 笔划应用了图像画笔的示例Example of an image brush applied to the stroke 转换为对象并呈现为对象的文本 可能与直接呈现的文本看起来不相同：Text that is converted to and rendered as a object may not look the same as text rendered directly: - 转换为对象的文本 不是使用 ClearType 呈现的。Text converted to a object is not rendered using ClearType. 此外，转换的基线不会与整个显示像素对齐。In addition, the baseline of the converted is not snapped to a whole display pixel. - 小型字体，如正文文本中常用的字体，可能会丢失可读性、模糊性并在外观上有所不同。Small fonts, such as those commonly used in body text, may lose legibility, appear blurred, and vary in appearance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 对象并检索带格式文本及其边界框的几何。The following example shows how to create a object and to retrieve the geometries of the formatted text and its bounding box. [!code-csharp[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/CSharp/OutlineTextControl.cs#createtext)] [!code-vb[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/visualbasic/outlinetextcontrol.vb#createtext)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定要应用于文本的文本修饰的类型。The class specifies the types of text decorations to apply to the text. 有四种类型的文本修饰：下划线、基线、删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 这些值是在 中的每个项上设置的值 。These are described as values that are set on each item in the . 很常见的情况是 ，集合只包含一个修饰，但属性通过将多个修饰应用于同一文本来使用该集合来提供更高级的修饰效果。It is common that the collection contains only one decoration, but the property uses the collection to provide for more advanced decoration effects by applying multiple decorations to the same text. 下图显示了文本修饰相对于文本的位置。The following illustration shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文本修饰类型示例Example of text decoration types 此方法设置 整个文本字符串的。This method sets the for the entire text string. 若要设置 文本字符串子集的，请使用 方法。To set the for a subset of the text string, use the method.
